comments.body: I'll try to bump this to 0.3.7.dev in a separate PR-- I need to log in to gcc compile farm on another machine to get that updated though

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@    - export PATH="${extra_path}${PATH}"
    # check OpenBLAS version
    - python tools/openblas_support.py --check_version 0.3.5
    # run the test suite
    - python runtests.py -- -rsx --junit-xml=$SHIPPABLE_REPO_DIR/shippable/testresults/tests.xml -n 2 --durations=10
